Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius).
Mix sugar and flour in a large bowl. Add eggs and buttermilk, blend well. Stir in melted butter and vanilla. Pour the mixture into the pie crust.
Bake the pie in the preheated oven until the filling is firm, for approximately 45 minutes.
Take into account variations in ingredient quantities and overall cooking duration when preparing the magazine version of this recipe.
